message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You'll get less, I'll get more, let's try again!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going all the way to 70%!
Getting closer, but I'm not there yet...
Getting closer to the middle, but I'm not giving up yet!
Getting closer to the middle, but I'm not going to give in yet!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more!
